title: Tradesy: Buy and Sell Fashion
description:
Shop designer fashion at up to 70% off, and cash in on your closet, hassle-free.
SELL DIRECTLY FROM YOUR CLOSET
Share the styles you no longer wear with the next savvy shopper on Tradesy. List pieces in great condition, from Zara to Louis Vuitton.
SHIP WITH FREE KIT
When you sell an item, we'll send you a pre-paid, pre-addressed shipping kit, complete with beautiful packaging so you can ship without any extra effort.
SHOP FEARLESSLY, AUTHENTICITY GUARANTEED
Our promise to you: every item you purchase on Tradesy is authentic. If you're concerned an item you bought isn't, return it for free. We'll verify whether it's the real deal, and if it's not, we'll give you a full refund. Simple as that!
MORE ABOUT TRADESY
Tradesy is a curated marketplace where millions of women buy and sell fashion every month. We're on a mission to bring trust and fairness to fashion, making great style affordable and accessible to everyone.

Share the styles you no longer wear with the next savvy shopper on Tradesy. List pieces in great condition, from Zara to Louis Vuitton.

SHOP FEARLESSLY, AUTHENTICITY GUARANTEED
Our promise to you: every item you purchase on Tradesy is authentic. If you're concerned an item you bought isn't, return it for free. We'll verify whether it's the real deal, and if it's not, we'll give you a full refund. Simple as that!

MORE ABOUT TRADESY
